title: “Conditions have changed and improved in Sri Lanka”, says British Minister Alistair Burt in the Parliament
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma “There is no doubt that conditions have changed in Sri Lanka and have improved to a degree after the conflict, but the issue is how far that goes,” Alistair Burt, The Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs said in the British Parliament this afternoon on Tuesday…
